codebases.frontend

        The canonical namespace of source is the namespace its dependencies are resolved in.
        Returns:

      • derivedSource

        Source derivedSource(java.lang.String name)
        Some compiler jobs are dynamically generated during compiling a resource, but are not directly stored in the resource. For instance when a Fabric interface is translated to FabIL, the compiler generates a *_JIF_IMPL class that implements instanceof for that interface, among other things. To ensure flexible handling between phases, we create a 'derived' source that is backed by the link to the original resource, but permits a new job to be scheduled.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        A source derived from this CodebaseSource with a new (short) name
